verses.text: \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* \w an|strong="H5648"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*, \w sixty|strong="H8361"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0521"\w* high \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w six|strong="H8353"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0521"\w* \w wide|strong="H6613"\w*: \w he|strong="H1768"\w* put it up \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* valley \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Dura|strong="H1757"\w*, \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* land \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w to|strong="H7972"\w* get together \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* captains, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* chiefs, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w rulers|strong="H7984"\w*, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* wise men, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* keepers \w of|strong="H4430"\w* public money, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w judges|strong="H1884"\w*, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* overseers, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w rulers|strong="H7984"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* divisions \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* country, \w to|strong="H7972"\w* \w come|strong="H0858"\w* \w to|strong="H7972"\w* see \w the|strong="H3606"\w* unveiling \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* put up.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* captains, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* chiefs, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w rulers|strong="H7984"\w*, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* wise men, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* keepers \w of|strong="H4430"\w* public money, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w judges|strong="H1884"\w*, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* overseers, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w rulers|strong="H7984"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* divisions \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* country, came together \w to|strong="H4083"\w* see \w the|strong="H3606"\w* unveiling \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* put up; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* took \w their|strong="H3606"\w* places \w before|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* put up.

Then one \w of|strong="H5972"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* king's criers \w said|strong="H0560"\w* in a loud voice, \w To|strong="H0560"\w* you \w the|strong="H0560"\w* order \w is|strong="H0560"\w* \w given|strong="H0560"\w*, O \w peoples|strong="H5972"\w*, \w nations|strong="H0524"\w*, \w and|strong="H0524"\w* languages,

\w That|strong="H1768"\w* \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sound \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w*, pipe, \w harp|strong="H6460"\w*, \w trigon|strong="H5443"\w*, \w psaltery|strong="H6460"\w*, \w bagpipe|strong="H5481"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* sorts \w of|strong="H4430"\w* instruments, comes \w to|strong="H5308"\w* \w your|strong="H5020"\w* ears, \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H5308"\w* go \w down|strong="H5308"\w* on \w your|strong="H5020"\w* faces \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* before \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w has|strong="H1768"\w* put up:

\w And|strong="H5308"\w* anyone \w not|strong="H3809"\w* falling \w down|strong="H5308"\w* \w and|strong="H5308"\w* worshipping \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* same hour \w be|strong="H8160"\w* put \w into|strong="H1459"\w* a burning \w and|strong="H5308"\w* flaming \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w at|strong="H6966"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w time|strong="H2166"\w*, \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w*, \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sound \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w*, pipe, \w harp|strong="H6460"\w*, \w trigon|strong="H5443"\w*, \w psaltery|strong="H6460"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* sorts \w of|strong="H4430"\w* instruments, \w came|strong="H5308"\w* \w to|strong="H5972"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* ears, went \w down|strong="H5308"\w* on \w their|strong="H3606"\w* faces \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w before|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* put up.

At \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w time|strong="H2166"\w* \w certain|strong="H1400"\w* Chaldaeans \w came|strong="H7127"\w* \w near|strong="H7127"\w* \w and|strong="H7127"\w* made \w a|strong="H2166"\w* statement \w against|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w*.

They made answer \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*, \w have|strong="H4430"\w* life \w for|strong="H0560"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*.

\w You|strong="H0607"\w*, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*, \w have|strong="H4430"\w* given an order \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w every|strong="H3606"\w* \w man|strong="H0606"\w*, \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sound \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w*, pipe, \w harp|strong="H6460"\w*, \w trigon|strong="H5443"\w*, \w psaltery|strong="H6460"\w*, \w bagpipe|strong="H5481"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* sorts \w of|strong="H4430"\w* instruments, comes \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* ears, \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* go \w down|strong="H5308"\w* \w on|strong="H0606"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* face \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* before \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*:

\w And|strong="H5308"\w* anyone \w not|strong="H3809"\w* falling \w down|strong="H5308"\w* \w and|strong="H5308"\w* worshipping \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H5308"\w* be put \w into|strong="H1459"\w* a burning \w and|strong="H5308"\w* flaming \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*.

\w There|strong="H0383"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w certain|strong="H1400"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H0383"\w* put \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* business \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* land \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*; \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w have|strong="H0383"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* given \w attention|strong="H2942"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*: \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w servants|strong="H6399"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w your|strong="H6399"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w* \w or|strong="H0426"\w* worshippers \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H0383"\w* put up.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H6925"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2528"\w* \w and|strong="H4336"\w* passion \w gave|strong="H0560"\w* \w orders|strong="H0560"\w* \w for|strong="H0560"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* be sent \w for|strong="H0560"\w*. \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* made \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w come|strong="H0858"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w made|strong="H6966"\w* answer \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w*, \w Is|strong="H1768"\w* it \w true|strong="H6656"\w*, O \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w servants|strong="H6399"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w god|strong="H0426"\w* \w or|strong="H0426"\w* give \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H0383"\w* put up?

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w ready|strong="H6263"\w*, on hearing \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sound \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w*, pipe, \w harp|strong="H6460"\w*, \w trigon|strong="H5443"\w*, \w psaltery|strong="H6460"\w*, \w bagpipe|strong="H5481"\w*, \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* sorts \w of|strong="H0426"\w* instruments, \w to|strong="H4481"\w* go \w down|strong="H5308"\w* on your faces \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* before \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w have|strong="H0383"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w*, \w it|strong="H2006"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* well: \w but|strong="H1768"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* give \w worship|strong="H5457"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* same hour \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* put \w into|strong="H1459"\w* \w a|strong="H5648"\w* burning \w and|strong="H5308"\w* flaming \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*; \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w what|strong="H4479"\w* \w god|strong="H0426"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w there|strong="H0383"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* able \w to|strong="H4481"\w* take \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w hands|strong="H3028"\w*?

\w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*, answering \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, There \w is|strong="H0560"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w need|strong="H2818"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* us \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w give|strong="H8421"\w* \w you|strong="H5922"\w* an \w answer|strong="H6600"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* question.

\w If|strong="H2006"\w* our \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* \w servants|strong="H6399"\w* \w we|strong="H0586"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w*, \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w able|strong="H3202"\w* \w to|strong="H3202"\w* keep us safe \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* burning \w and|strong="H4430"\w* flaming \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w your|strong="H6399"\w* \w hands|strong="H3028"\w*, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* keep us safe.

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w*, \w be|strong="H0426"\w* certain, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w servants|strong="H6399"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w your|strong="H6399"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*, \w or|strong="H0426"\w* give \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H0383"\w* put up.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w was|strong="H5020"\w* full \w of|strong="H0861"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2528"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* form \w of|strong="H0861"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w face|strong="H0600"\w* \w was|strong="H5020"\w* \w changed|strong="H8133"\w* \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*: \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w gave|strong="H0560"\w* \w orders|strong="H0560"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* fire \w was|strong="H5020"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* be \w heated|strong="H0228"\w* up \w seven|strong="H7655"\w* \w times|strong="H2298"\w* \w more|strong="H5922"\w* \w than|strong="H1768"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w was|strong="H5020"\w* generally \w heated|strong="H0228"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4336"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w gave|strong="H0560"\w* \w orders|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w certain|strong="H1400"\w* \w strong|strong="H1401"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w in|strong="H1768"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w army|strong="H2429"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* put cords on \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w* \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w* \w and|strong="H4336"\w* put \w them|strong="H0560"\w* \w into|strong="H7412"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* burning \w and|strong="H4336"\w* flaming \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* had cords put round \w them|strong="H0479"\w* \w as|strong="H0116"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w were|strong="H1400"\w*, in their \w coats|strong="H6361"\w*, their \w trousers|strong="H5622"\w*, their hats, \w and|strong="H0116"\w* their clothing, \w and|strong="H0116"\w* \w were|strong="H1400"\w* dropped \w into|strong="H1459"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* burning \w and|strong="H0116"\w* flaming \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4336"\w* \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* king's order \w was|strong="H4430"\w* not \w to|strong="H4481"\w* be put on \w one|strong="H1836"\w* side, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w heat|strong="H0228"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w fire|strong="H5135"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w so|strong="H1768"\w* great, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* took \w up|strong="H5267"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w* \w were|strong="H1400"\w* burned \w to|strong="H4481"\w* death \w by|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w flame|strong="H7631"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4336"\w* \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w*, \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*, with the cords about \w them|strong="H0479"\w*, went \w down|strong="H5308"\w* \w into|strong="H1459"\w* the burning \w and|strong="H4336"\w* flaming \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*.
